LanguageData.SadjuukColonization.label: UN Colonization Programm
LanguageData.SadjuukColonization.description: Opening of the United Nations Colonization Program's recommendations and technologies.
LanguageData.SadjuukConstructionA.label: Construction A
LanguageData.SadjuukConstructionA.description: This essential research allows the construction of Concrete Buildings, Glass and essential structures.
LanguageData.SadjuukConstructionB.label: Construction B
LanguageData.SadjuukConstructionB.description: This military research allows the production of Armored Walls and Doors, essential to build bunkers and camouflaged defense positions.
LanguageData.SadjuukConstructionC.label: Construction C
LanguageData.SadjuukConstructionC.description: This research allows the construction of advanced Walls and Doors using the strongest materials.
LanguageData.SadjuukPowerA.label: Power A
LanguageData.SadjuukPowerA.description: This essential research allows the construction of Chemfuel Generators and refinery.
LanguageData.SadjuukPowerB.label: Power B
LanguageData.SadjuukPowerB.description: This research allows the production of advanced and armored Chemfuel Generators.
LanguageData.SadjuukPowerC.label: Power C
LanguageData.SadjuukPowerC.description: This advanced research allows the production of High Pressure Hydrogen and Hydrogen Fuel Cells.
LanguageData.SadjuukFurnitureA.label: Furniture A
LanguageData.SadjuukFurnitureA.description: This essential research allows the construction of essential furniture, lights, research and medical equipments.
LanguageData.SadjuukFurnitureB.label: Furniture B
LanguageData.SadjuukFurnitureB.description: This research allows the construction of advanced furniture, medical, research and surgery equipments.
LanguageData.SadjuukFurnitureC.label: Furniture C
LanguageData.SadjuukFurnitureC.description: This research allows the construction of advanced furniture and equipments.
